statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_rating > 4.5;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE conflict_of_interest = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_rating < 3 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE conflict_of_interest = FALSE;
SELECT AVG(performance_rating) AS average_rating FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating, conflict_of_interest FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE conflict_of_interest = TRUE;
SELECT performance_rating, employee_id FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE conflict_of_interest = FALSE;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating, conflict_of_interest FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics;
SELECT full_name, performance_rating FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT department, full_name FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM ConflictsOfInterest WHERE conflict_type = 'Ethical';
SELECT employee_id, description FROM ConflictsOfInterest ORDER BY conflict_id ASC;
SELECT full_name, department, performance_rating FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_rating > 3 ORDER BY department ASC, full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, department, AVG(performance_rating) AS average_rating FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics GROUP BY department HAVING AVG(performance_rating) > 4 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;

SELECT e.full_name, c.conflict_type, c.description FROM ConflictsOfInterest c JOIN EmployeePerformanceMetrics e ON c.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE c.conflict_type = 'Financial' ORDER BY e.full_name ASC;

SELECT e.full_name, c.conflict_type, COUNT(*) AS num_conflicts FROM ConflictsOfInterest c JOIN EmployeePerformanceMetrics e ON c.employee_id = e.employee_id GROUP BY e.full_name HAVING num_conflicts > 1 ORDER BY num_conflicts DESC;

SELECT e.full_name, e.department, COUNT(c.conflict_id) AS num_conflicts FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics e LEFT JOIN ConflictsOfInterest c ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id GROUP BY e.full_name, e.department ORDER BY num_conflicts ASC, e.full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee_Performance_Metrics;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee_Information ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating FROM Employee_Performance_Metrics WHERE conflicts_detected = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Conflict_Resolution_Log WHERE resolution_status = 'pending' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department, performance_rating FROM Employee_Information INNER JOIN Employee_Performance_Metrics ON Employee_Information.employee_id = Employee_Performance_Metrics.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM Employee_Performance_Metrics WHERE conflicts_detected = TRUE ORDER BY performance_rating DESC
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee_Information WHERE department = 'HR'
SELECT * FROM Conflict_Resolution_Log WHERE resolution_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY log_id ASC
SELECT employee_name, department, performance_rating FROM Employee_Information JOIN Employee_Performance_Metrics USING (employee_id)

SELECT Employee_Information.employee_name, Employee_Performance_Metrics.performance_rating, Conflict_Resolution_Log.conflict_description FROM Employee_Information JOIN Employee_Performance_Metrics ON Employee_Information.employee_id = Employee_Performance_Metrics.employee_id JOIN Conflict_Resolution_Log ON Employee_Information.employee_id = Conflict_Resolution_Log.employee_id WHERE performance_rating >= 80 AND resolution_status = 'Open'
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM Employee;
SELECT * FROM Conflict ORDER BY date_reported DESC;
SELECT conflict_description, date_reported FROM Conflict WHERE conflict_description LIKE '%issue%';
SELECT employee_name, department, position, salary FROM Employee WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT employee_name, position, salary FROM Employee WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC;

SELECT e.employee_name, c.conflict_description, cr.resolution_description FROM Employee e JOIN Conflict c ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id JOIN ConflictResolution cr ON c.conflict_id = cr.conflict_id;
SELECT e.employee_name, p.metric_name, p.metric_value, p.metric_date FROM Employee e JOIN PerformanceMetric p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE p.metric_value > 90 ORDER BY p.metric_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM Employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT DISTINCT position FROM Employees;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformance ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT employee_id, performance_review FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE performance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY salary DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, department, position FROM Employees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT e.name, p.performance_review, p.performance_score FROM Employees e JOIN EmployeePerformance p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE p.performance_score > 80 ORDER BY e.name ASC;

SELECT c.conflict_description, c.conflict_date, e1.name AS conflicted_employee, e2.name AS reporting_employee FROM ConflictsOfInterest c JOIN Employees e1 ON c.conflicted_employee_id = e1.employee_id JOIN Employees e2 ON c.reporting_employee_id = e2.employee_id ORDER BY c.conflict_date DESC;

SELECT er.relationship_type, e1.name AS employee1, e2.name AS employee2, er.relationship_start_date FROM EmployeeRelationships er JOIN Employees e1 ON er.employee1_id = e1.employee_id JOIN Employees e2 ON er.employee2_id = e2.employee_id WHERE er.relationship_start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY employee1 ASC;
